Summary: Entirely quiet. Gave off silver flash and flew.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog when I saw a flash in the sky. It was completely silent, so I noticed it wasn't anything man-made, such as a plane, helicopter, blimp, etc. I looked up quickly to see a star-like object give a flash of silver light so bright, I thought it was almost a miniature sun. It flew off into the clouds a second later and I couldn't find it.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Chalfont
There was one other sighting in Chalfont on or around August 2nd 2008
